WorkItem.Description:
Hi ... I've been trying to install PHPExcel from the pear channel for about a week and a half, and it fails with the following error:
```

sudo pear channel-discover pear.pearplex.net
Discovering channel pear.pearplex.net over http:// failed with message: channel-add: Cannot open "http://pear.pearplex.net/channel.xml" (Connection to `pear.pearplex.net:80' failed: No route to host)
Trying to discover channel pear.pearplex.net over https:// instead
Discovery of channel "pear.pearplex.net" failed (channel-add: Cannot open "https://pear.pearplex.net/channel.xml" (Connection to `pear.pearplex.net:443' failed: No route to host))
```
Any attempt to visit pearplex.net website also fails.

Any idea when normal service will resume?
